title: Patching Network Connectivity Problems
body: I am in a location where internet isn't THAT great, yet it has been fairly steady at around 400-500kbps (I don't like it any more than you do).  I am trying to install the game/patches on a new computer yet sometimes the client will say "trying to reconnect" or something along those lines.  The real problem is when it can't reconnect and I am forced to exit the client.  When I do this though, the entire download has to restart from the beginning.  Any help with remedying this would be greatly appreciated.

replies.body: hey, can you please look at my recent post my display is crashing after exiting the match.

It sounds like your connection is pretty unstable and can't keep up.  :/  It's disconnecting you from multiple services including the game server and those in the client.  The steps in our [connection issues](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752664-Troubleshooting-Connection-Issues) guide could help you out here with optimization, but slower speeds could impact you too.
